013package org.apache.juneau.http.entity;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.IOUtils.*;
016
017import java.io.*;
018import java.nio.charset.*;
019import java.util.function.*;
020
021import org.apache.http.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.assertions.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.http.header.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
026
027/**
028 * A basic {@link org.apache.http.HttpEntity} implementation with additional features.
029 *
030 * Provides the following features:
031 * <ul class='spaced-list'>
032 *    <li>
033 *       Caching.
034 *    <li>
035 *       Fluent setters.
036 *    <li>
037 *       Fluent assertions.
038 *    <li>
039 *       Externally-supplied/dynamic content.
040 * </ul>
041 *
042 * <ul class='seealso'>
043 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-rest-common">juneau-rest-common</a>
044 * </ul>
045 */
046@BeanIgnore
047@FluentSetters
048public class BasicHttpEntity implements HttpEntity {
049
050   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
051   // Static
052   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
053
054   /**
055    * An empty HttpEntity.
056    */
057   public static final BasicHttpEntity EMPTY = new BasicHttpEntity().setUnmodifiable();
058
059   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
060   // Instance
061   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
062
063   private boolean cached, chunked, unmodifiable;
064   private Object content;
065   private Supplier<?> contentSupplier;
066   private ContentType contentType;
067   private ContentEncoding contentEncoding;
068   private Charset charset;
069   private long contentLength = -1;
070   private int maxLength = -1;
071
072   /**
073    * Constructor.
074    */
075   public BasicHttpEntity() {
076   }
077
078   /**
079    * Constructor.
080    *
081    * @param contentType The entity content type.
082    * @param content The entity content.
083    */
084   public BasicHttpEntity(ContentType contentType, Object content) {
085      this.contentType = contentType;
086      this.content = content;
087   }
088
089   /**
090    * Copy constructor.
091    *
092    * @param copyFrom The bean being copied.
093    */
094   public BasicHttpEntity(BasicHttpEntity copyFrom) {
095      this.cached = copyFrom.cached;
096      this.chunked = copyFrom.chunked;
097      this.content = copyFrom.content;
098      this.contentSupplier = copyFrom.contentSupplier;
099      this.contentType = copyFrom.contentType;
100      this.contentEncoding = copyFrom.contentEncoding;
101      this.contentLength = copyFrom.contentLength;
102      this.charset = copyFrom.charset;
103      this.maxLength = copyFrom.maxLength;
104      this.unmodifiable = false;
105   }
106
107   /**
108    * Creates a builder for this class initialized with the contents of this bean.
109    *
110    * <p>
111    * Allows you to create a modifiable copy of this bean.
112    *
113    * @return A new builder bean.
114    */
115   public BasicHttpEntity copy() {
116      return new BasicHttpEntity(this);
117   }
118
119   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
120   // Properties
121   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
122
123   /**
124    * Specifies whether this bean should be unmodifiable.
125    * <p>
126    * When enabled, attempting to set any properties on this bean will cause an {@link UnsupportedOperationException}.
127    *
128    * @return This object.
129    */
130   @FluentSetter
131   public BasicHttpEntity setUnmodifiable() {
132      unmodifiable = true;
133      return this;
134   }
135
136   /**
137    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if this bean is unmodifiable.
138    *
139    * @return <jk>true</jk> if this bean is unmodifiable.
140    */
141   public boolean isUnmodifiable() {
142      return unmodifiable;
143   }
144
145   /**
146    * Throws an {@link UnsupportedOperationException} if the unmodifiable flag is set on this bean.
147    */
148   protected final void assertModifiable() {
149      if (unmodifiable)
150         throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Bean is read-only");
151   }
152
153   /**
154    * Sets the content on this entity bean.
155    *
156    * @param value The entity content, can be <jk>null</jk>.
157    * @return This object.
158    */
159   @FluentSetter
160   public BasicHttpEntity setContent(Object value) {
161      assertModifiable();
162      this.content = value;
163      return this;
164   }
165
166   /**
167    * Sets the content on this entity bean from a supplier.
168    *
169    * <p>
170    * Repeatable entities such as {@link StringEntity} use this to allow the entity content to be resolved at
171    * serialization time.
172    *
173    * @param value The entity content, can be <jk>null</jk>.
174    * @return This object.
175    */
176   @FluentSetter
177   public BasicHttpEntity setContent(Supplier<?> value) {
178      assertModifiable();
179      this.contentSupplier = value == null ? ()->null : value;
180      return this;
181   }
182
183   /**
184    * Sets the content type on this entity bean.
185    *
186    * @param value The new <c>Content-Type</c> header, or <jk>null</jk> to unset.
187    * @return This object.
188    */
189   @FluentSetter
190   public BasicHttpEntity setContentType(String value) {
191      return setContentType(ContentType.of(value));
192   }
193
194   /**
195    * Sets the content type on this entity bean.
196    *
197    * @param value The new <c>Content-Type</c> header, or <jk>null</jk> to unset.
198    * @return This object.
199    */
200   @FluentSetter
201   public BasicHttpEntity setContentType(ContentType value) {
202      assertModifiable();
203      contentType = value;
204      return this;
205   }
206
207   /**
208    * Sets the content length on this entity bean.
209    *
210    * @param value The new <c>Content-Length</c> header value, or <c>-1</c> to unset.
211    * @return This object.
212    */
213   @FluentSetter
214   public BasicHttpEntity setContentLength(long value) {
215      assertModifiable();
216      contentLength = value;
217      return this;
218   }
219
220   /**
221    * Sets the content encoding header on this entity bean.
222    *
223    * @param value The new <c>Content-Encoding</c> header, or <jk>null</jk> to unset.
224    * @return This object.
225    */
226   @FluentSetter
227   public BasicHttpEntity setContentEncoding(String value) {
228      return setContentEncoding(ContentEncoding.of(value));
229   }
230
231   /**
232    * Sets the content encoding header on this entity bean.
233    *
234    * @param value The new <c>Content-Encoding</c> header, or <jk>null</jk> to unset.
235    * @return This object.
236    */
237   @FluentSetter
238   public BasicHttpEntity setContentEncoding(ContentEncoding value) {
239      assertModifiable();
240      contentEncoding = value;
241      return this;
242   }
243
244   /**
245    * Sets the 'chunked' flag value to <jk>true</jk>.
246    *
247    * <ul class='notes'>
248    *    <li class='note'>If the {@link HttpEntity#getContentLength()} method returns a negative value, the HttpClient code will always
249    *       use chunked encoding.
250    * </ul>
251    *
252    * @return This object.
253    */
254   @FluentSetter
255   public BasicHttpEntity setChunked() {
256      return setChunked(true);
257   }
258
259   /**
260    * Sets the 'chunked' flag value.
261    *
262    * <ul class='notes'>
263    *    <li class='note'>If the {@link HttpEntity#getContentLength()} method returns a negative value, the HttpClient code will always
264    *       use chunked encoding.
265    * </ul>
266    *
267    * @param value The new value for this flag.
268    * @return This object.
269    */
270   @FluentSetter
271   public BasicHttpEntity setChunked(boolean value) {
272      assertModifiable();
273      chunked = value;
274      return this;
275   }
276
277   /**
278    * Specifies that the contents of this resource should be cached into an internal byte array so that it can
279    * be read multiple times.
280    *
281    * @return This object.
282    * @throws IOException If entity could not be read into memory.
283    */
284   @FluentSetter
285   public BasicHttpEntity setCached() throws IOException {
286      assertModifiable();
287      cached = true;
288      return this;
289   }
290
291   /**
292    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if this entity is cached in-memory.
293    *
294    * @return <jk>true</jk> if this entity is cached in-memory.
295    */
296   public boolean isCached() {
297      return cached;
298   }
299
300   /**
301    * Specifies the charset to use when converting to and from stream-based resources.
302    *
303    * @param value The new value.  If <jk>null</jk>, <c>UTF-8</c> is assumed.
304    * @return This object.
305    */
306   @FluentSetter
307   public BasicHttpEntity setCharset(Charset value) {
308      assertModifiable();
309      this.charset = value;
310      return this;
311   }
312
313   /**
314    * Returns the charset to use when converting to and from stream-based resources.
315    *
316    * @return The charset to use when converting to and from stream-based resources.
317    */
318   public Charset getCharset() {
319      return charset == null ? UTF8 : charset;
320   }
321
322   /**
323    * Specifies the maximum number of bytes to read or write to and from stream-based resources.
324    *
325    * <p>
326    * Implementation is not universal.
327    *
328    * @param value The new value.  The default is <c>-1</c> which means read everything.
329    * @return This object.
330    */
331   @FluentSetter
332   public BasicHttpEntity setMaxLength(int value) {
333      assertModifiable();
334      this.maxLength = value;
335      return this;
336   }
337
338   /**
339    * Returns the maximum number of bytes to read or write to and from stream-based resources.
340    *
341    * @return The maximum number of bytes to read or write to and from stream-based resources.
342    */
343   public int getMaxLength() {
344      return maxLength;
345   }
346
347   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
348   // Other methods
349   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
350
351   /**
352    * Converts the contents of this entity as a string.
353    *
354    * <p>
355    * Note that this may exhaust the content on non-repeatable, non-cached entities.
356    *
357    * @return The contents of this entity as a string.
358    * @throws IOException If a problem occurred while trying to read the content.
359    */
360   public String asString() throws IOException {
361      return read(getContent());
362   }
363
364   /**
365    * Converts the contents of this entity as a byte array.
366    *
367    * <p>
368    * Note that this may exhaust the content on non-repeatable, non-cached entities.
369    *
370    * @return The contents of this entity as a byte array.
371    * @throws IOException If a problem occurred while trying to read the content.
372    */
373   public byte[] asBytes() throws IOException {
374      return readBytes(getContent());
375   }
376
377   /**
378    * Same as {@link #asBytes()} but wraps {@link IOException IOExceptions} inside a {@link RuntimeException}.
379    *
380    * @return The contents of this entity as a byte array.
381    */
382   protected byte[] asSafeBytes() {
383      try {
384         return asBytes();
385      } catch (IOException e) {
386         throw new RuntimeException(e);
387      }
388   }
389
390   /**
391    * Returns an assertion on the contents of this entity.
392    *
393    * <p>
394    * Note that this may exhaust the content on non-repeatable, non-cached entities.
395    *
396    * @return A new fluent assertion.
397    * @throws IOException If a problem occurred while trying to read the byte array.
398    */
399   public FluentStringAssertion<BasicHttpEntity> assertString() throws IOException {
400      return new FluentStringAssertion<>(asString(), this);
401   }
402
403   /**
404    * Returns an assertion on the contents of this entity.
405    *
406    * <p>
407    * Note that this may exhaust the content on non-repeatable, non-cached entities.
408    *
409    * @return A new fluent assertion.
410    * @throws IOException If a problem occurred while trying to read the byte array.
411    */
412   public FluentByteArrayAssertion<BasicHttpEntity> assertBytes() throws IOException {
413      return new FluentByteArrayAssertion<>(asBytes(), this);
414   }
415
416   /**
417    * Returns the content of this entity.
418    *
419    * @param <T> The value type.
420    * @param def The default value if <jk>null</jk>.
421    * @return The content object.
422    */
423   @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
424   protected <T> T contentOrElse(T def) {
425      Object o = content;
426      if (o == null && contentSupplier != null)
427         o = contentSupplier.get();
428      return (o == null ? def : (T)o);
429   }
430
431   /**
432    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if the contents of this entity are provided through an external supplier.
433    *
434    * <p>
435    * Externally supplied content generally means the content length cannot be reliably determined
436    * based on the content.
437    *
438    * @return <jk>true</jk> if the contents of this entity are provided through an external supplier.
439    */
440   protected boolean isSupplied() {
441      return contentSupplier != null;
442   }
443
444   @Override /* HttpEntity */
445   public long getContentLength() {
446      return contentLength;
447   }
448
449   @Override /* HttpEntity */
450   public boolean isRepeatable() {
451      return false;
452   }
453
454   @Override /* HttpEntity */
455   public boolean isChunked() {
456      return chunked;
457   }
458
459   @Override /* HttpEntity */
460   public Header getContentType() {
461      return contentType;
462   }
463
464   @Override /* HttpEntity */
465   public Header getContentEncoding() {
466      return contentEncoding;
467   }
468
469   @Override /* HttpEntity */
470   public boolean isStreaming() {
471      return false;
472   }
473
474   @Override /* HttpEntity */
475   public void consumeContent() throws IOException {}
476
477   @Override /* HttpEntity */
478   public InputStream getContent() throws IOException, UnsupportedOperationException {
479      return IOUtils.EMPTY_INPUT_STREAM;
480   }
481
482   @Override /* HttpEntity */
483   public void writeTo(OutputStream outStream) throws IOException {}
484
485   // <FluentSetters>
486
487   // </FluentSetters>
488}
